changes: Fixed `setup` slash command. (`Cannot destructure property 'guildId' of 'message' as it is undefined.`)
Added role parameter checking for `setup` slash command.
Select menus/filters didn't work when there were no pages.
Fixed rare error when using slash commands: Message won't edit and bot crashes.
Fixed moderator action permissions and conditions. Moderators/admins were able to make moderation actions on members with higher hierarchy than them.
Fixed same audit-logs sending more than once occasionally.
Added the bot's **Terms of Service (ToS)** and **Privacy Policy.** Access them with the `legal` command.
